name: AstroValet
description:
NOTE:  Don't stop the game or pause it while playing, otherwise the commands may not be synced to the music.

Welcome to the famous interspacional accademy for Astro Valets.
Follow the teachings of the teachers to become a prestigious astro valet, to help spaceships land.
Follow the instructions and press the right key on the right time.
3 levels, all completely different in style,  art and music.

Instructions:

During the main gameplay, press the arrow keys and S, D keys based on the commands you have to perform.

Click on the buttons to go to the next scene.

During cutscenes, press SPACE to continue the dialogue.

Credits
Mirko Pani - Main Programmer
Giacomo Ambrosini - Co-Programmer
Isaia Boscato - Art animator
Lorenzo Costa - Art director
Tommaso Maddalena - Composer

Created with love using Unity3D.
Thank you for playing the game!
